rules_text:
Ward–Pay 4 life.
[i]Warp[/i] – {2}, Pay 3 life: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.
[i]Summon Monster[/i] – {4}, Pay X life: Create an X/X black Monster creature token with your choice of flying, trample or first strike.
